snippet.title: BHP engaged in major SA projects
snippet.content: Mining giant BHP has embarked on the most significant investment program ever at its Olympic Dam operations in South Australia, a senior official says. Olympic Dam Asset President Jacqui McGill told a business lunch in Adelaide on Friday that 49 projects were currently underway worth more than $600 million. "This represents the most significant investment we've ever made in our South Australian operations," Ms McGill said. Originally published as
